name: Chaos just kinda had its charm ig
name_original: Chaos just kinda had its charm ig
description:
An explosive simulator where you can drive over houses and Nuke an entire city and  some random ancient village that posses no harm to you. Why? Idk, why not? Destruction does have its charm lmao so yeah. :')
